headline: 2025-10-27 — arXiv preprint authors (power-interactions paper) illustrated their control architecture by deploying 1 RLC circuit with a controllable voltage source for demonstration (evidence: "we utilize a simple RLC circuit with a controllable voltage source for illustrations").

2025-10-28 — arXiv preprint authors (power-interactions paper) implemented 2 control methods for the lower-layer physical model: Feedback Linearizing Control (FBLC) and Sliding Mode Control (SMC) (evidence: "This command is implemented using either Feedback Linearizing Control (FBLC) or Sliding Mode Control (SMC)").

2025-10-29 — arXiv preprint authors (power-interactions paper) derived and issued 1 intermediate reactive power control command from the interactive energy state-space model to the lower-layer model (evidence: "The higher layer design utilizes the interactive energy state-space model to derive intermediate reactive power control, which becomes a control command to the lower layer physical model").

2025-10-30 — arXiv preprint authors (quadcopter thrust-vectoring paper) used quaternion state feedback to compute motor control commands as 4-element quaternion vectors (evidence: "quaternion state feedback is utilized to compute the control commands for the UAV motors").
